content.Comment: For replacing 'Requires tag' when using tag requirements

contentList.content:
Savage Sortilege gives all magical skills a critical chance equal to your critical chance score.
This is an innate talent, and is automatically inherited.

The Pawn permits your character 1 AP worth of free movement per turn.
This is an innate talent, and is automatically inherited.

Pet Pal enables you to talk to animals.
This is an innate talent, and is automatically inherited.
